t: Loud Technologies Acquired By Transom Capital - Bobby Owsinski's Music Production Blog
s: October 17, 2017 - Loud Technologies, owner of iconic audio brands Ampeg, Blackheart, Crate, EAW, Mackie, Martin Audio and TAPCO, has been acquired by Transom Capital Group, according to a statement from both companies. The new company will be called LOUD Audio, LLC, and will continue to be led by the current ...

s: October 19, 2017 - Transom Capital Group acquired all brands from LOUD Technologies, Inc., including the iconic Mackie, Ampeg, EAW, and Martin Audio brands.

t: Loud Technologies - Crunchbase Company Profile & Funding

t: LOUD Audio 2025 Company Profile: Valuation, Investors, Acquisition | PitchBook
s: LOUD Technologies Inc is a professional audio and music products company. Its brand includes Mackie, Blackheart, Crate and TAPCO. The company engineers, markets and distributes a wide range of professional audio and musical instrument products worldwide.
